channel.title: CVE Feed for EC-CUBE CO.,LTD. -- EC-CUBE
channel.description: The latest CVEs for EC-CUBE CO.,LTD. -- EC-CUBE

item.title: CVE-2014-0808|2024-08-06T09:27:20.153Z -- ec-cube%20co.%2Cltd. -- ec-cube
item.description: Authorization bypass through user-controlled key issue exists in EC-CUBE 2.11.0 through 2.12.2 and EC-Orange systems deployed before June 29th, 2015. If this vulnerability is exploited, a user of the affected shopping website may obtain other users' information by sending a crafted HTTP request.
